name: Blue Reef Ember
description:
Controls: WASD to move, arrow keys to attack, X to interact, P to pause, M to mute.

Another weird little experiment in the same vein as my last game. I wanted to try a one screen game without gravity, since it allowed me to make the level denser and more maze like. I don't plan on doing any more of these for a while, but it was definitely fun to tinker around with.

Downloadable versions of all my games are now available for windows here.

https://sigilcipher.itch.io/four-strange-games-by-...
